title: Treating the Qur'an as a Joke
transcript: that whoever takes anything from the quran lightly does not take it seriously makes fun of it or throws it in a place that is disrespectful like the dustbin or the sewer whoever falsifies what's mentioned in the quran and he says no no this is not true humans are not from adam and eve he claims humans have evolved from apes this is a kafir whoever says that whoever
